text:
University of California | Application Developer | Irvine, CA | ONSITE

At the University of California, Irvine (UCI), we're looking for an application developer to join our small team.

This is a great opportunity for a new graduate looking for a start. Read more about it here https://www.oit.uci.edu/job/2018-0677/

If you decide to apply, please say you heard about it on Hacker News.
